member.name: IP_ADAPTER_PREFIX
member.summary: The IP_ADAPTER_PREFIX structure stores an IP address prefix.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_PREFIX.Alignment
member.summary: Reserved. Used by the compiler to align the structure.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_PREFIX.Length
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_PREFIX.Flags
member.summary: This member is reserved and should be set to zero.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_PREFIX.Next
member.summary: A pointer to the next adapter prefix structure in the list.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_PREFIX.Address
member.summary: The address prefix, in the form of a structure.

member.name: IP_ADAPTER_PREFIX.PrefixLength
member.summary: The length of the prefix, in bits.
